title: Add unit and integration tests with Vitest
description: The project has zero test coverage. Add Vitest and write tests for core modules: clickup-api.ts (mock fetch, test slugify/formatTaskForClaude), config.ts (env loading priority), git-ops.ts (mock execFile, retry logic), claude-worker.ts (prompt construction, needs-input detection), runner.ts (state machine, orphan recovery). Target 80%+ line coverage.

title: Add webhook support as alternative to polling
description: Currently clawup polls every 30s. Add an optional webhook HTTP server mode (--webhook-port) that listens for ClickUp taskStatusUpdated events for instant task pickup. Keep polling as fallback with longer interval when webhooks are active.

title: Add task filters for scoped automation
description: Add TASK_TAGS env var to only process tasks with specific tags, TASK_PRIORITY to filter by minimum priority level, and MAX_TASKS_PER_RUN to limit tasks per polling cycle. This gives teams control over which tasks get auto-implemented.

title: Add plugin/hook system for extensibility
description: Add lifecycle hooks (beforeProcess, afterProcess, onSuccess, onFailure, beforeMerge) as async functions in clawup.config.mjs. This enables Slack notifications, custom PR templates, CI check verification before merge, etc.
